Title: Battleforge: Assault
Description:
A card battle game.

This project is being built using Silverlight 4 in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A card battle game.

This project is being built using Silverlight 4 in C#.

Currently the project is really just an exercise in learning Silverlight and C# using a fun but complex game as the base. Once the framework is in place, most of the work will be writing the individual cards. If you are not a member of the development team and happened to stumble your way here looking for something useful, I would suggest moving on for now. That is unless you have a very strong desire to work with a couple lax devs who may never have anything really working and spend more time talking architecture than getting things done. If that's you, feel free to contact Bejumi for more info on the project.
